sentences.en: Almost all of it could be traced to Henrietta , the house keeper . whom Eleanor had handpicked.
sentences.cn: 其原因几乎完全可以追溯到埃莉诺亲自挑选的管家亨里埃塔身上.

sentences.en: I loved you enough to be silent and let you discover your handpicked friend a creep.
sentences.cn: 我爱你至深才保持沉默,让你自己去发现你精挑细选的朋友原来是个另人讨厌的家伙.
他精挑细选的顾问之一

trans.tran_cn: 用手挑选的，精选的，凭个人挑选的，偏心挑选的
trans.tran_en: someone who is handpicked has been carefully chosen for a special purpose

trans.tran_cn: 用手采摘( handpick的过去式和过去分词 )，仔细挑选，精选，亲自挑选
